template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Physical Therapy package!

This industry package is designed specifically for physical therapy and rehabilitation practices, including kinesiotherapists, physiotherapists, osteopaths, and other rehabilitation and therapy professionals, helping you manage your patients, appointments, and billing in one fully integrated system.

By installing this package, you gain access to a set of essential applications, including CRM, Appointments, Calendar, and Invoicing, allowing you to focus on patient care while Odoo handles your daily operations.
Getting Started To begin, you'll find the key applications you need on your Odoo dashboard. Let's take a closer look at how you can use these tools.
You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

ul.li: The CRM App(Customer Relationship Management) helps you manage patient inquiries and follow-ups.
The Appointments App manages your appointment types and allows patients to book consultation.

font.span: Manage your schedule and your availability in the

ul.li: Ease your invoicing process with the Invoice App.

div.p: You didn't import demo data? You can still do it. Go to Apps > Industries > Upgrade your Pysical Therapy package and check the related box.

template.p: You receive a call from a new patient, Emily, who is experiencing lower back pain and would like to consult a kinesiotherapist.
In the CRM App, you create a new opportunity for Emily, recording her contact details and the reason for consultation (e.g. back pain, postural issues, rehabilitation).
As you review her needs, you move the opportunity to Qualified, indicating that a consultation is required.

div.class: o_editor_banner lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false
w-100 px-3 o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true
div.p: You can also configure an email alias so everyone sending email to this one will create a new opportunity for you.
To do so, go to CRM > Configuration > Sales Teams.

template.p: From Emily's opportunity in the CRM, you can invite her to book her first session in just a few clicks.

Using the Chatter on the right side of the opportunity, click Send a message, select the ‚ÄúBook your next appointment‚Äù email template, and send it to the patient. The email contains a direct booking link, allowing the patient to select an available time slot and book the appointment online.

div.class: o_editor_banner lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false
w-100 px-3 o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true
div.p: You may also create a personalized website in a few clicks by adding the Website App, your appointment page will be automatically added.

template.p: All emails sent and received are automatically recorded in the Chatter, giving you a clear history of your communication with the patient. Once the patient books an appointment, it is automatically synchronized across CRM, Appointments, and Calendar, keeping your schedule up to date without manual work.

div.class: o_editor_banner lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false
w-100 px-3 o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true
div.p: You can easily adapt this flow using automations. For example:

li.p: When an opportunity moves to ‚ÄúQualified‚Äù, automatically send the booking email to the patient
When an appointment is completed, automatically send a follow-up email suggesting the next session

div.p: To configure this, click the gear icon at the top of a CRM column and select Automation, or add automated emails directly in the Appointment Type settings.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: For treatment plans that require multiple sessions (for example, 10 sessions prescribed by a doctor), go to the Calendar App, create an appointment, assign the patient, and set it as recurring.
By doing this, the corresponding time slots are automatically reserved and will no longer be available on the public booking link, ensuring your availability remains accurate.

div.class: o_editor_banner lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false
w-100 px-3 o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true
div.p: To reduce your no show rate drastically, appointments automatically comes with reminders by Email and SMS.

template.p: Once an appointment is booked, you can see it in the Calendar App.
From there, you can:

li.p: Move or reschedule the appointment (the patient is notified automatically)
Block time slots for treatments or personal availability

template.p: The Appointments App and Calendar App are fully synchronized, ensuring your availability is always up to date.

div.class: o_editor_banner lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false
w-100 px-3 o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true
div.p: The Odoo Calendar App is compatible with Outlook and Google Calendar. Activate the sync in the Calendar App settings.

template.p: During or after a therapy session, you can easily record clinical notes:

li.p: Use Log Note on the patient's contact to keep internal treatment notes
Create a dedicated knowledge article for each patient to track progress, exercises, or treatment plans

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: To follow up on a patient's treatment plan, you can quickly see how many sessions have already been completed by clicking the Appointments stat button on the patient‚Äôs contact form.
This is especially useful when sessions are prescribed by a doctor and need to be tracked accurately.

div.class: o_editor_banner lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-warning pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false
w-100 px-3 o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true
div.p: Be careful, using the "Log Note" in your contact will be displayed only for you and your eventual team. If you select the "Send message" option, this will notify your customer (which can be really interesting also).

template.p: If you navigate to the Invoice App, you can manage your invoices. You have many possibilities to streamline your invoicing process:

ul.li: Auto-post your invoice on a regular basis.
Add an upfront payment in your Appointment Type.
Add the Subscription App and invoice automatically based on a subscription type.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3
o_editor_banner_content o-contenteditable-true w-100 px-3
div.p: If you only need to invoice part of a session or treatment plan to the patient (for example, X% paid by the patient while the rest is covered by insurance or a mutual fund), you can use a down payment.
The down payment is deducted from the final invoice, keeping billing clear and accurate for both the patient and the insurer.
